document_data.mainbody:
he Immer Stream was a small stream located in the town of Immersea in Cormyr during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The stream originated from Spring Hill on the southwest side of Immersea at a small waterfall called Sel√ªnes Stairs. The stream flowed due east along the south side of Immersea, eventually connecting with the Wyvernwater. It crossed Calantars Way along its way.
